directions: Place salmon fillets on parchment-lined baking sheets.
In a medium bowl, combine crust ingredients of your choice.
Divide evenly among fish fillets, press crust on top of fish.
Bake for 15 minutes until crust is golden brown and fish is flaky.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon Stonemill Essentials Ground Black Pepper
¼ cup Chef's Cupboard Plain Breadcrumbs
title: Citrus Crusted Salmon
